title: Giant’s New Carbon Fiber Kids’ Bike Shows the Future of Recycled Carbon Fiber for Weight Weenies: Taipei Cycle Show 2025
content:
Trust me, this might be the most exciting bike in Taipei Cycle Show, and its not because its a $500 kids' push bike
